Uses of InvokeMethod in gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters.date
 

Subclasses of InvokeMethod in gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters.date
 class DayOfMonth
          Transformation that calculates the day of month of a date.
 class DaysDiffFromEpoch
          Transformation that calculates the time passed between a date and epoch in days.
Epoch is defined in GregorianCalendar as January 1, 1970.
 class Month
          Transformation that calculates the month of a date.
 class Year
          Transformation that calculates the year of a date.

 class RemoveSymbolsAndReplaceLatinWithSimilarGreekChars
          This Transformation gets the uppercase form of a string, and then replaces any latin character that has a visually equal greek character with its visually equal greek character.
